reviewText:
I bought this to help decide on the personal practicality of a specific product on the DVD.

It will help you decide whether to purchase the product described for the uses intended, or whether to build one yourself.  Better yet, it will help you decide if you wish to go this route.  Many do, and swear by the results.

Plus, of course, you get all the other goodies that are on the DVD....and it's Banachek, so that is sort of a Slam-Dunk anyway.
